title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 223.2 - Incorporation by reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 223.2 - Incorporation by reference

State Regulations

The Public Playground Safety Handbook, December 29, 2015, is
hereby incorporated by reference and has been filed in the Office of the

Secretary of State of the State of New York. This publication may be obtained
from the publisher, U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission, 4330 East West

Highway, Bethesda, MD, 20814, and is readily available without charge on the
internet at
https://cpsc.gov/s3fs-public/325.pdf; this internet address may also be accessed via the New York State Division of

Consumer Protection website at
www.dos.ny.gov/consumerprotection. This publication is also available for public inspection at the New York

State Division of Consumer Protection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
223.2

Renumbered
from 4605.2 of title 21

New

York State Register May 2, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 18, eff. 5/2/2018

Amended

New

York State Register February 17, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 07, eff. 2/17/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
